quien_soy.page_title: Who I Am | Raz Podestá - Digital Ecosystem Architect
quien_soy.page_description: Discover the fusion of two decades of elite software engineering with a creative, AI-driven vision, designed to build high-performance digital assets.
quien_soy.intro_subtitle: My name is Raz Podestá. And my purpose is to transform your vision into a high-performance digital asset.

act_i.title: Act I: The Engineer's Foundation
act_i.description: For over 20 years, my career was forged in the engine room of technology: backend systems architecture, data business, and data analysis. This foundation in systems engineering is not just my past; it is the guarantee that every project I build today is born on unbreakable foundations, designed for scale and resilience.

act_ii.title: Act II: The Strategic Shift
act_ii.description: I realized that the market didn't need more code, but holistic solutions that integrated technical excellence with a compelling brand strategy and user experience. This was my turning point: the decision to become independent to merge the rigor of an engineer with the vision of a creative architect.

act_iii.title: Act III: The Sovereign Arsenal
act_iii.description: To materialize this vision, I forged my own arsenal. 'LIA Legacy,' my sovereign AI co-pilot, not only radically accelerates development but acts as a strategic co-author in every solution. In parallel, my 'ES' methodology ensures a high-speed, high-clarity development lifecycle, which translates into a drastic reduction in technical debt for my clients.

act_iv.title: Act IV: The Digital Premise Philosophy
act_iv.description: My philosophy is simple: I don't build 'sites,' I build 'digital premises.' Every project begins with a robust architectural foundation (an Nx monorepo) prepared for unlimited growth. This means that when you invest in a solution with me, you're not buying a house; you're acquiring land that's ready for a skyscraper. Scalability isn't a future idea; it's the starting point.

act_v.title: Act V: The Growth Arsenal
act_v.description: Creativity and technology only make sense if they drive results. That's why my work spans the entire conversion spectrum: from designing marketing and sales funnels to creating high-quality content and developing Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) that dominate the mobile experience. I am a full-stack builder and a strategic partner in modernizing and evaluating technological projects.

mission_vision.mission_description: To orchestrate the entire digital conversion lifecycle. We forge intelligent, sovereign ecosystems that unify brand strategy, experience creation, and continuous optimization, transforming marketing from a game of guesswork into a science of predictable growth.
mission_vision.vision_subtitle: Our vision is to be the driving force behind a new paradigm: the web as a living, self-optimizing ecosystem, where every interaction fuels a perpetual growth flywheel.

vision_pillars.title: Understand
vision_pillars.description: We don't just capture metrics; we achieve holistic observability. We integrate qualitative and quantitative data to build a dynamic visitor profile, understanding the 'why' behind every 'what'.

vision_pillars.title: Adapt
vision_pillars.description: The platforms we build are not static. They are living entities that use artificial intelligence to adapt and evolve harmoniously, personalizing the experience in real-time to meet each user's needs.

vision_pillars.title: Maximize
vision_pillars.description: Conversion is not an event, it's a science. Our ecosystem uses the insights generated to fuel a cycle of continuous optimization, ensuring that every asset and every campaign becomes inherently more effective over time, maximizing business objectives.

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: A multidisciplinary software architect with over 20 years of experience, specializing in creating 'intelligent digital brains' instead of simple websites. My philosophy is to merge deep systems engineering with a strategic product vision and a passion for UX to build scalable, resilient, and high-performance digital assets that drive measurable business results. I don't build sites; I build sovereign ecosystems designed to grow.

duties: Design and development of software architectures based on monorepos (Nx) for complex projects.
Implementation of sovereign Headless CMS and GraphQL APIs with Apollo Server, NestJS, and Sequelize.
Creation of high-performance Progressive Web Apps (PWA) with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
Development of 'LIA Legacy', an orchestrating AI co-pilot to accelerate the software development lifecycle.
Led development teams on large-scale projects for the finance, retail, and media sectors.
Optimized SQL and NoSQL databases, achieving performance improvements of up to 300%.
Implemented Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, reducing time-to-market by 50%.
Mentored and trained developers, improving code quality and team productivity.
